website_summaries.verdict: A wireless headset that works well for low-budget, low-expectation projects.
pros: It's packaged with a headset and Lavaliere microphone, it's easy to set up, and the receiver shows adequate range
The entire device is lightweight, and it does a favorable job with battery life
cons: The overall gain on both microphones are subpar, so recordings may be left with a high-frequency white noise-like hiss

customer_reviews.title: This Wireless Microphone is the one of the best kept secrets for the budget filmaker
customer_reviews.text: This Wireless Microphone is the one of the best kept secrets for the budget filmaker. the plug and play nature and great sound quality straight out the box competes with systems costing five times as much. I use it with my Lumix G7 camera using a simple adaptor and it sounds clearer than some of the wired lapel mics Ive used. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aloy  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Simple to setup and use. Good audio quality and decent range.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this mic set. I think the lapel mic sounds good and the unit gets pretty decent range. It is easy to setup and use. Just a single button for turning on and on and another button for changing the channel. I think a lot of your success with this unit will depend on your setup. I recommend that you keep within line of sight and don't go through any walls. Also, you should have a decent mixer or amp as the gain on this is not incredibly loud. I use this mic mostly for when I am in a single room and need to record audio while walking about in that room.
customer_reviews.author: McKay CTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: With all the great reviews, I went ahead and purchased this for making instructional videos for online courses. I film with a digital camera, as well as my iPhone. I was very disappointed that this was not compatible with iPhones. In spite of what people say, the sound quality of this mic is horrible. I spent a little more thinking I was getting better quality, however I am terribly disappointed. I would not recommend this mic for professional work. I'm sure it would work okay for professional speaking, but I do not recommend this for recording. I could have spent less money for a mic that was more versatile, and better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: EST

customer_reviews.title: Kind of easy to pair both devices
customer_reviews.text: As a Beatboxer I search for high quality microphones.This one is slightly in that category. Kind of easy to pair both devices. Annoying to constantly worry about whether your speaker will hiss or not. I know this product isn’t going to be perfect,I don’t expect it to be. Improvements I highly recommend but,overall it’s not that bad of a microphone to use. (NOTICE) You don't have to triple-click the top button to reset unit back to factory status in most case. But just hold the power button for about 2 secs, and turn on receiver, then the units are ready to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.JessicaLynn

customer_reviews.title: The Lavalier mic won't pick up sound unless it's right in front of your mouth
customer_reviews.text: I got this wireless mic system because I speak to groups in a small/medium lecture hall environment and at 71 years old my voice is starting to give out. I really wanted to use the Lavalier mic because it's unobtrusive. Unfortunately, unless I hold the mic directly in front of my mouth it simply cannot pick up my voice. I wanted to try other Lavalier mics but the connectors aren't compatible. Even the headset mic works only marginally and picks up breathing as much as my voice. For the price, the rest of the system seems reasonably well designed. For my purposes it was a big disappointment. I'll be returning the unit soon.
customer_reviews.author: FredL

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money or time on this product
customer_reviews.text: Neither the headset or the lapel mics pick up my voice unless it is actually touching my lips. I am not satisied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival - Trying Again
customer_reviews.text: I inserted the batteries correctly. Pressing the on/off button on the transmitter got a momentary flash on the LCD screen a few times, then nothing. It's going back. Very disappointing considering this was an Amazon Choice. I returned it by dropping it off at my nearby Amazon Locker - very easy and I had other stuff to pick up. The seller contacted me offering to send a new unit. Since it's an Amazon Choice and most reviews are good, I've accepted the offer. I was thinking of ordering it again anyway. Here's hoping for better results soon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wales

customer_reviews.title: It seems like an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I had some difficulty, the units were not pairing. It took a day for customer support to get back with me. We determined low voltage levels in the batteries on the receiving unit. My new AAA batteries must have been week. I could find no reason for them to drain change to a more reliable brand, even went to a rechargeable battery. I tested the mic over a couple day and then last night used the mic for a 3 hr presentation. It seems like an excellent product. Customer support went way beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good wireless mic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mic for the price. Can be used with a PA, mixer, or on a camera with the included adapter. I have tried many wireless mics in my studio that just didn't work very well or at all, this one works. The sound from the mic is a little thin but that can be fixed in post production. You can easily get 30-40' feet of range if there is nothing between the transmitter and receiver. Overall very good for the money. Check out the video review for more info.
customer_reviews.author: Bullcity Pix

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: It never worked, tried everything. And contacting the seller is impossible if your item doesn't work. He doesn't answer my emails. Don't buy this! I've seen people with similar problems. Refund me and i'll delete this review.
customer_reviews.author: Arnar

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Range
customer_reviews.text: This product actually surprised me. I wasn't too sure about the plastic casing and how well the range would go, but it is actually pretty good. I walked all the way across my backyard and tested the range, as long as I had direct line-of-sight, I was still good. If I were using this for personal vlogs or tutorials, I'd say, go for it. If you have more money to spend, then I'd go for a higher-end set up. The only suggestion I have is that they create a clip for the receiver so that it clips onto the mount on top of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Foster

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed in the performance-Very little sound. Useless as received.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very well packaged. Nice sturdy white box (iPhone box quality) . Foam inserts and cutouts inside that hold everything in place. Came with all the attachments, line-in adapter, and two different mic's. Looks like a very quality product... BUT sound quality from both of the supplied microphones was completely useless. If you hold the mic right in front of your mouth and cup your hand, you can hear it from the stereo speakers, otherwise there is not sound amplification. Really disappointed since it looked like very good quality...
customer_reviews.author: v75rab

customer_reviews.title: Defective transmitter--what a shame!
customer_reviews.text: While I did manage to follow the poorly written instructions well enough to turn on the transmitter and receiver, the led display on the transmitter wouldn't stay lit up and the device couldn't be paired with the receiver. After watching the video and consulting the online FAQ, I couldn't resolve this. I'll be trying a different brand for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: TIM Talks Cooking

customer_reviews.title: A great value will an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: I got this microphone set up for my youtube channel and its a must for someone looking for a lavalier mic at a budget price. It's a simple, no-nonsense setup. Very nice quality, lightweight, and easy to use. I got great sound from this mic and it blows away any onboard camera mic I've ever had. If you're looking for a wireless lavalier mic setup and you don't want to play hundreds of dollars, get this mic. If I had one complaint, its the fact that the receiver doesn't have anything to place it on a camera hot shoe mount. That would have really helped, but its a minor point that was easily remedied.
customer_reviews.author: Jofer Jeff Productions

customer_reviews.title: Sent mine back: unusable as a lavalier
customer_reviews.text: I got this mike for my daughter's acting and singing videos but it doesn't pick up her voice very well when clipped to her collar. If you hold it in your hand and speak into it directly it responds better, but that defeats the purpose of a lavalier! I don't think it would be suitable for any kind of singing, though. I don't think mine came with the head mounting option shown in the photo, but I would not have used it anyway. There is a noticeable sound (hum or hiss) from the wireless carrier wave, especially during silence and a t higher volumes. It might work OK for some in very specific applications, but I wouldn't buy another one
customer_reviews.author: R. GAZY

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, some issues
customer_reviews.text: Good: Good quality sound, cheap price. Weird: color scheme for connection light on receiver - red is good, green means no connection. In most of the world green is good, red means somethings wrong. Bad: Auto sets level, so that the first few seconds are too sensitive and then levels off. I would rather be able to turn this off or set sensitivity. Eats batteries. Ugly: Battery box on transmitter is incorrectly sized for the AAA batteries so that the batteries are consistently falling off the contacts as they shift around freely. Had to shim with wads of paper around the batteries to jam the the batteries to stay put on the electrodes.
customer_reviews.author: bulldawg1964

customer_reviews.title: This Lav Microphone works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.text: This mic is great! The product is strong and sturdy! Plug and play, nothing is easier! I am a Pro DJ of 14 years. This mic was worth every penny. I hooked up this mic to the back of my powered speaker that was in my garage. I was curious to see how far I could walk before the connection dropped out. VERY IMPRESSED! THROUGH A WALL! I walked across the street and could still hear my voice clearly! 100 FEET! I measured after I walked back to my garage. Clear, crisp and very affordable. How much more do you want? FIFINE TECHNOLOGY has it right on this one. BUY IT TODAY, YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Abram A.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for a professional product
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this for a DJ gig in a public space - terrible interference. At first i thought it was the unit but it didn’t matter after a first return I learned that if there is anything in the way of a point to point line of site you will get cutouts - not very good when it’s used for a presentation in which commands are being issued by an instructor. At one point if the instructor walked around the signal would not catch. I ended up using a wireless mic unit instead to save face.
customer_reviews.author: Iconpyro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mic. Once I got it I did a little testing. The quality was pretty decent. But sometimes it just didn't connect right. Of the 4 times I tried to use this it worked 1 of those times. I think there is something wrong with one of the connectors. I'm not a tech person. Unfortunately I got busy with other projects and didn't have time to return it on time. So now I have a piece of crap that doesn't work for me. When something doesn't work then all those other qualities it was supposed to have mean nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Wireless microphone
customer_reviews.text: The sound reproduction is very clear and audible. No feedback through the PA system. The only issue I have is that if one needs to plug into a mini-audio port on a computer to project sound through a sound system, no such port is available. Neither is a cable to connect to the transmitter. A simple solution is to place the microphone next to the computer speaker to project sound via the wireless system. The receiver, if left on between presentations, will drain batteries quickly. Be sure to have spare batteries available. Have used this system on my PA system with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: John Sachs

customer_reviews.title: A great wireless option for a good price
customer_reviews.text: After trying to find a good wireless mic on amazon for less than $50 I finally found one! This mic maintains good audio consistently and even lets you change the frequency if you get interference. Pros: -Price -Sound Quality -2 Different Options: lapel or headset -Batteries: So you can hot swap if some die -Audio adapters included -Range Cons: -Batteries not included -Headset was small and not comfortable for my big head I have bought a $50 lapel mic on Amazon before only to have it barely function. You cannot beat the price for what you get on this mic!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Bratton

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to write a review. Since the very beginning, the connection has been inconsistent. It cuts in and out, and sometimes, it just cuts out ans stays out. I have to them turn it off and then back on and it will work for a few more minutes. I would not recommend this product and I am going to continue looking for a better system.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with high hopes but discovered that it only works as long as the batteries are at the very top of their charge. After 15-20 minutes, it cuts off. Change to new, fresh batteries and it works again, for another 15-20 minutes. This was clearly engineered by idiots. Don't waste your money. Had them too long to get a refund. Absolute CR@P! This company can go out of business, they deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lecoq

customer_reviews.title: Too much unreliable
customer_reviews.text: It was too much unreliable. Not meant to be used outside. Time to time it disconnects from the receiver during on-going recording process. Had to do voice-over in post processing to insert voice to video. Double work. And battery doesn't last longer(hardly 40 minutes a pair in both Rx & Tx). I tried to take out batteries after one 30 min recording session, that gave me another ~10 minutes of juice another day with the same set of batteries. But if you forget to take those out after recording, you have to throw those batteries next time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joydeep Halder

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a wireless lav mic! That said, there are a few pros and cons with this product. Everything has to be measured against the very low price. You do get what you pay for. Pros: Easy to use Connects easily Decent sound Cons: Eats batteries The "ready" light is red, and the not ready light is green. ???? Sometimes there's a background hum All in all, I consider this a nice transitional microphone, and I'll use it for a few months while I save up for a good one. I like this better than the wired lavaliers, if only because changing the batteries on the wired can be fiddly, and the wire is easy to trip over.
customer_reviews.author: I. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Poor signal. Doesn't send a consistent audio signal without getting interrupted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup for my Sennheiser, high end MIc. One that would work with a battery pack for out door shows. I thought at $40 for the FIFINE I’d take the risk. The casing is plastic and it uses a 1/4 inch plug instead of a XLR. But, besides that , I was able to get clear sound and never had a problem with range or interference. I’m saving my Sennheiser for indoor stage shows and have bought a 2nd FIFINE as a backup for my backup. I was able to get even more gain that the Sennheiser before it started to feedback. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Lavaliere mic isn't sensitive to your voice while clipped onto you.
customer_reviews.text: Lavaliere mic isn't sensitive to your voice while clipped onto you. Only if you hold it directly in front of your mouth. There is also no volume to adjust the incoming audio. I returned it and received another exact item figuring with so many good reviews I must have gotten a lemon but the same thing happened on the second exact item. Someone is fudging their reviews. To add insult to injury when I asked to return the second one, the only choice they gave me was to get an amazon gift card instead of credit on my credit card! Keep away!
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: A cheap and flimsy wireless mic that works.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in the 80s using very expensive wired and wireless lapel mics. At that time they were not practical for the common person, but now, we can have that luxury of old. However, this comes at the cost of durability. I use this mic regularly and it works great. However, its build quality is extremely (and I mean extremely) cheap. So be careful. If you're careful, it will work fine. The receiver tends to eat up batteries so buy many replacements. A great unit for the price. But be careful with it!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Niemczyk

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Works conditionally
customer_reviews.text: ORIGINAL REVIEW: The audio disappears randomly for shorter or longer periods. Even when it is on, the sound quality is abysmal. UPDATE: When using outdoors the transmitter must be in line of sight of the receiver for it to work well. Also, listen to the sound in earphones, don't just record to video without checking sound quality (as one can do with a wired mic). If there is too much radio interference, the sound quality suffers. Changing frequency might help. Having played around with it and got experience, I now give it 3 stars. It can be useful, but if I can, I will use a wired mic instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ulf E.

customer_reviews.title: The few days it worked service was great but then the batteries had to be changed in ...
customer_reviews.text: The few days it worked service was great but then the batteries had to be changed in both the receiver and transmitter and it has not worked since. It's embarrassing when you are given a cordless microphone for your presentation and you refuse it indicating that you have you a Lavalier lapel microphone but soon after they have to bring you the cordless microphone because the set is not working even when you change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Woolford

customer_reviews.title: The Headset Mic works great, the Lapel mic is junk!
customer_reviews.text: The headset mic is great and works well, the lapel mic (mainly what I planned to use) is bad - it cuts in a out and generates lots of static. It appears to be at the mic end, wiggling the wire there causes it to cut in and out. Meanwhile, the headset mic works well. It is pulled into the mic port on a 2 channel Fifine hand held wireless microphone set. Does not interfere with the operation of either of those mics. If the lapel mic worked it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: L1Active

customer_reviews.title: Great mic! one thing though ...
customer_reviews.text: Mic is great! With Covid, we are teaching outdoor fitness classes and I use this mic! Range and clarity are great. Easy to use. Only thing to consider, the mic arm (that goes to the mouth piece) is a not metal so it's a little bouncy. If you are just talking (e.g. lecturing) or teaching Pilates, yoga, strength type of classes, it works fine. But for bouncy classes (kickboxing or dance), the mic arm bounces around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price to value ratio!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bang for the buck!!! The microphone provides amazing signal and clear reception. The Cardioid pickup patter does provide grate feedback rejection. I do recommend having the receiver close to the transmitter as the range is not to wide. Changing frequencies is easy on the unit. I love that it only has one button. I'll most likely order the handheld device.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Calderon

customer_reviews.title: feed back is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in performances in small venues single artist. I watched the demo video and it seemed fine with no feed back ,not the case once you connect it. even on the side of the amp not in front of the speakers it screams at you . only way to stop the feed back is to go into another room, that is fine at home but does not work in a club. you cannot get to your amp to change sounds or any other reason as it feeds back so loud , voice is gone and people cringe at the feed back .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: work great, but the sound is sucks not satisfied waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to a more "professional" looking mic than that key fob on your ear! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I'm an instructor and I bought this a while ago, but just started using it for my online workouts bc I didn't think the overhead part would stay on, but it does! Be sure to snake the cord down your back, (females, use your sports bra to secure it 😉) and you're good! I used it in my class in a gym and it kept going out. I'm assuming bc of too much interference between me and the receiver (I had it behind the class), so I'll work that out but otherwise it's great! Oh, and make sure you use decent brand batteries or you'll be changing them every couple of weeks. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Tee W.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This set is very easy to get up and running quickly. The price is great. The microphone is very sensitive so if you use it to record video some sound editing will be needed but it is not a big deal. I love this because if you are interviewing someone as long as they are 3 or 4 feet away their audio will be loud and clear as if they are actually wearing the mic. I have used this upto 30 feet away and never encountered a problem, as my use case doesn't require anymore distance from the receiver I can't say what the max distance would effectively be. Great product for my use case of video recording.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and excellent
customer_reviews.text: I need a microphone to improve the sound for recording my video with my DSLR and this product makes my dream comes true. It is simple to understand, easy to operate, and affordable to buy. After trying is several times, I found it improves the sound a lot and makes it very clear. Due to video recording is not my job, I don't need a high quality professional one, this is the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Move over Hannah Montana!
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this for my presentation. My voice is not loud, and it easily connected to my wireless ION speaker and worked flawlessly. Just be sure your mic is not on when you are adjusting speaker, or you will get high pitched static over the speaker. The headset options were great. I did feel like I should be singing in a concert somewhere.... This little microphone system is easy to use, compact and great clear sound. So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, works very well!  Read instructions to optimize the setup though!
customer_reviews.text: This system does exactly what it's supposed to, and works really well actually - decent range!! My mistake was that I didn't read the instructions at first, and find a good frequency, so it was quite frustrating. But once I stopped and actually read the instructions, it worked perfectly. So take the time to do that! Also I didn't realize there was an antenna on the unit (again, cuz I didn't read the instructions at first). Very nice system for the money, I would def recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Very poor.
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy. Transmit unit causes batts to over heat and unit stops working. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Comes with instructions that are easy to comprehend, you'll need to purchase 2 AAA batteries and 2AA batteries to operate the receiver and transmitter. The plastic material is decent quality for the price. The microphone works really well. Your'e able to walk with your back facing the camera and your voice is still clear. This is user friendly and great for someone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: fotoladysince9

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Lav Mic!
customer_reviews.text: After about two weeks of use, it is easy to say that this is a great budget lavalier mic! (Coming from a videographer's perspective) If you don't have any audio gear whatsoever, and you are looking to expand your setup without breaking the bank, this is definitely a great buy. The only reason that I give the microphone 4/5 is that there were some minor things such as the receiver not having a hot shoe mount to mount it onto the camera, so the receiver would just be dangling off the camera. Also, there is no way to monitor the audio while you are recording. Minor things that don't take away from the great price of the lav mic!
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: From a suitable substitute to a fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchase them for the church. The pastor used the headset on Sunday to preach with; sounded okay but I can tell the difference between these and a professional version. They can get the job done until you can afford to purchase a more professional version if you like. I'm coming back to change/add to my review. After having more time to set up and equalize this microphone, it sounds great. This is a multiple services review.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Roy

customer_reviews.title: No mute button
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is really my fault for not noticing, but I have used lots of wireless mics for decades and every one of them had a "mute" button, so you could pause the transmission when you don't want your voice to be broadcast. This one doesn't have one and for public presentations that is a serious flaw...one I could imagine could be easily fixed. I'll update this review when I get to use the system.
customer_reviews.author: Alsand

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this mic for the price, Ive worked with every kind of mic from cheap to touring grade and while this is certainly a low priced mic the quality is ok. That being said this is good to use a few times or maybe once a year but in my experience the lapel clip broke basically as I took it out of the box. So durability is eh. Good for the price overall. PS: Not sure why they have noise cancellation listed because it doesn't really apply to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: FIFINE K037B Mic Review
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a wireless mic please check out my review video, I think it will really help. Here are some affiliate links to some Amazon products I talked about in the review. 4 Pack Cold Shoe Adapter:  Mekingstudio Dual Hot Shoe Mount Adapter:  2 Pack SMALLRIG 1/4 Camera Ball Hot Shoe Mount:  Konsait QR-40 Quick Release:
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Lamarr

customer_reviews.title: Needs post production editing to get the most out of it. Use Audacity to edit.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice budget wireless mic! It does have some hiss and the low and high frequencies are weak, that can be fixed somewhat in post production. I use for my YouTube channel when detailing vehicles and it’s great to be able to walk around and still have decent audio. Maybe they will upgrade the sound quality and make a standard 3.5mm jacks both for input and output for the Lav mic so you can switch out better Lav mics. If you are on a budget GET THIS SYSTEM FIRST and try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Detailing

customer_reviews.title: Used When Coaching
customer_reviews.text: I coach diving and between the music playing in the pool and my head swim coach's microphone, my voice gives out. It works well, but sucks up the battery life. Can't make it more than one 2 hour practice on a set of batteries. So, invested in rechargeable batteries. That helps. However, my coach's wireless microphone connected to the pool blows mine out and makes this stop working. Probably works well in other situations though. I highly recommend rechargeable batteries!
customer_reviews.author: V. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After reading review customer service contacted me and provided me with a free unit. Will give it another try. In 4 months have had 3 of these units go bad. First couple recordings are great, then I developed an audible hum in the recordings. Then the unit doesn't work at all. Save the time and spend more money on a more reliable, better system. This is truly a situations of getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: These work... good for... a camp maybe?
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound out of these is pretty bad... a camp talent show might use these with an amp... but not a music camp. Maybe a back stage manager to talk to the front of house. The price is appropriate. They function (hesitate to use the word "work"), and are simple to use. picked up the sound and only lost signal a few times in the 5 minutes of recording we did... finally got it after 3 bad takes... using a different mic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Multi Channels, 2 Microphones
customer_reviews.text: This wireless mic comes with 3 and 4 ring adapters for phone or PC. Two mics: Choose ether a Lavaliere/lapel style for unobtrusiveness or a headset mic to get close to the sound source and eliminate more background noise. Mic radio unit has adjustable channel setting to avoid radio interference. Overall quality for both mics is very good. Great Product; great price!!! Video to be added later.
customer_reviews.author: David Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: For the money you really cannot beat it. My biggest complaint is the lack of a cold shoe mount making it a pain to attach to a camera. Audio is better than you would expect in this price point. 5 minutes of post on the audio and it will keep up with a lot of budget shotgun microphones in a much better format for someone not staying close to the camera
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Band director approved!
customer_reviews.text: The headset mic works great. The wind shield allows some puffs on p’s to distort sound if the mic is too close to the lips. The lapel mic doesn’t work as well picking up sound. I used the headset mic like a collar mic and it is exceeding my expectations! I am a band director and have groups up to 84. I plugged this into a Peavey PA/keyboard amp. This $30 system does what $400 of Shure equipment would do!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This is very unreliable. Just spend the extra bucks to get something that will work. I hardly ever give bad reviews on items and when I seen such positive reviews I thought surely this would work but man was I wrong. This device goes in and out a lot, drains a lot of batteries in a short time of usage and has static at times for no reason. I tried using this indoors and this device made the audio a nightmare. 2 stars because the lapel mic alone picked up well when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: JMIC328

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the sound is great! You have to add a little bass into ...
customer_reviews.text: You just can't beat the quality of this product, for the price you pay. The distance of 'pick up' is remarkable, over 100 ft. The quality of the sound is great! You have to add a little bass into the final mix, but well worth the purchase of this product. Service is great also. I ordered 5 of these and one set was marked incorrect in the box. Service took care of it immediately, and stuck with me until it was corrected properly. Great product, great company.
customer_reviews.author: proadvantage

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit for General Use. A little flimsy build.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our public speaking. Good unit with plenty of range if you extend the base antenna. Has adapters for all sizes. Batteries for both base and headset, so be prepared for replacing as needed. The construction is a little flimsy, especially for the batter compartments. Biggest concern is that over time, the battery doors/slides will break. The headset takes a little time to get used to from a comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: A Great starter mic, Great price, Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this lavalier mic off amazon for my outdoor video shoot as well as for interview style videos. I needed a starter mic so I decided to go with FIFine company. The range on this mic is great. audio quality is good. I suggest to use a mixer instead of using directly into the Camera. If you prefer to use directly in the camera just make sure you do the adjustment in camera so auto quality is better. It comes with jack so you can use it with notebook/laptop or external mixer as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Patels

customer_reviews.title: Wireless microphone
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing wireless microphone unit for the price. I have sure wireless mic system I recorded in Nashville Tennessee under Daniel Brown Band you can see it on YouTube travel to many different church is leading worship and loving on people with God’s love. This is a great tool to use. God bless you guys hope it helps
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Nubia Brown

customer_reviews.title: value item
customer_reviews.text: for the price it works just fine. no background noise or hiss on a canon m6 and i adjusted sound level on camera to where the sound is roughly the same from the lavalier and headset mic. i was thinking to get the deity d3 pro but couldn't justify the price as i don't do video nearly as much as i take stills.
customer_reviews.author: gearheadskyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is spot on
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to purchase since the price was so low. I teach Spin class and is very clear over my loud music. Headpiece doesn’t press on my temples, and my voice is so clear. Sounds as good or even better than my headset that cost 3 times as much and way easier to set up. Small receiver box is convenient without all kinds of cords to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For anyone who wants more in there audio game!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to take the opportunity on my first product review! huge thanks to the people at FIFINE for helping us out getting this video together! Enjoy! FIFINE microphones got some gooooooood microphones! check them out here! Link to Wireless Headset Microphone System K037B:
customer_reviews.author: Nickolision

customer_reviews.title: The Best for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best wireless microphone system. The lavalier has great sound quality, no noise and was great from far away. Used with my Canon Vixia camcorder and was fantastic. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ccrn59

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but love.
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! The price point is fantastic too. Straight out of the box to using the set took 10 minutes or less. Install the batteries and pair, viola! The range is great. Indoors, down stairs and through walls the audio was still clear during my test. I'm pleasantly surprised and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TruRevu

customer_reviews.title: Chinese junk at it finest.
customer_reviews.text: Had to announce a rodeo and my old wireless give out. So i thought I’d buy this just for the perf that night. This Chinese junk wouldn’t even connect to the mic. It never worked. It’s very cheap junk. I knew for the price it’d be junk but figured it atlest work a second. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lynn Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Requires two kinds of batteries
customer_reviews.text: The transmitter uses AA batteries and the receiver uses AAA batteries. As they don't last very long, this means you have to carry two kinds of spare batteries. There is no reason the receiver couldn't use AA batteries. It would make them last longer. Sound quality is acceptable. It's too soon to see how durable it is, but the headset microphone seems fairly flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Background hiss
customer_reviews.text: I didn't hesitate to order this based on the positive reviews. Unfortunately, the mic that was delivered doesn't live up to the hype. It sounds like a cheap wireless lav and has a constant background hiss. I tried every different channel and they are all actually very clean except for the hiss. I've attached a raw video file from my camera to this review so you can hear for yourself what the hiss from this mic sounds like. I'm returning it and will likely bite the bullet and purchase a Rode or Sennheiser. You get what you pay for and if clean, quality audio is important to you this is probably not your mic.
customer_reviews.author: Tech to My Door

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for church services! Works great with mixer and tablet thingy my sound engineer uses to interface it with. I wanted the lapel mic because I wear glasses but both of my associate pastors don't wear glasses and they wanted the boom mic - this unit had both!! Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this mic.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a Christmas gift. He does lots of presentations on astronomy and natural sciences for groups here in the Rio Grande Valley. He spent an hour or so trying out the unit and hooking it up to a small portable speaker. The results were exceptionally good in every respect. He has used it "in the field" and loves it. It is better than we had hoped in both ease of use and quality of results.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Butler

customer_reviews.title: Shame on me for buying twice
customer_reviews.text: The first one broke within 3 weeks of using. I assumed I mishandled it somehow, and I was responsible for breakage. So the 2nd one I ordered I BABIED it, and kept it in a box alone in between use. That one lasted 6 weeks. Don't waste your money on this one...
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great microphone for low budget quality audio!Paired with my Tascam DR40, I have used this device for a couple of events and the signal has been strong when using the wireless mic. I would say to stay in the 30ft range to make sure the audio is clearly being recorded without interference. Additionally I had issue getting the transmitter and receiver to pair but support helped me get to the problem, fixed it quickly and have checked up on the situation to make sure there is no more problems. I would highly recommend this mic set!
customer_reviews.author: Chawker

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The product does work. I have not had any noise issues when doing my recordings. The thing that happened right off though the lapel mic holder broke, super cheap plastic. I needed to turn the mic around on my very first use and it broke. I have it zip tied but its sad that is so cheap. I have not tried the headset. The wireless part has worked well though. Just note its not hoing to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Wireless Lav Microphone
customer_reviews.text: First thing I have to say about this Microphone. It is $36 and it sounds amazing. Believe it or not I did a really big video productions video at my job and I used this microphone. It held up very well and it did the job amazing. I cant complain to be honest. So if you are in the market for a wireless lav microphone and are on a budget this is the Microphone for you. The only negative thing is the receiver feels kinda cheap but it holds up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: decent for the budget youtuber
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality set with a couple of different mic options in a low priced package. The wireless range that this thing has is CRAZY.. You can walk very far away and it still picks you up clearly. I don't recommend keeping the mic too close to your face, other than that, it's a bargain for what it is. Wireless in a nice little package!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jax

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Mic System
customer_reviews.text: I thought this performed great for a beginner microphone and can be a great device to accompany your cell phone or plug into a sound system. The only down side is that you can't manually turn down the mic volume and there isn't a way to mount this mic receiver to a camera or camcorder. Overall, for a 35 dollar mic system, with all that you get I am impressed with how it performed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Coyne

customer_reviews.title: I don't like any more maybe came with a defect.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first time I used it, it worked well, just a little lost of sound when I placed it on my waist beside, then I worked with it placing it on the low back area. But today I tried to teach a class and it did not work any more, I tried it with another speaker but when a place it on my body, on the chest or on the waist it did not work. Maybe is just this item that came with a defect. Maybe you should buy it and try it, to see if your work.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyns G.

customer_reviews.title: My first WireLess Microphone
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microphone so we could stand further away from the camera then a wired one. It was extremely easy to set up, just put in batteries and it is working. It came with phone and DSLR camera adapters. The distance was great. The audio quality is not perfect but for the price it over delivered. I am very happy with my wireless microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Googles

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry-Level Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lav and headset mic for over 3 months now. Haven't had any issues with it, using the same batteries from day one, and have experienced no problems with durability. All in all, it's a great entry-level microphone for the stage or in front of the camera (using the included adapter). I am very happy with my purchase and am glad to have this freedom with audio, as distance was always an issue when recording. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Mic Do Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up device to three different audio systems and if I turned the volume to max and had the mic touching my lips I barely got sound better than my normal speaking voice. This is especially frustrating for the body mic that is supposed to be worn on lapel. Called company and they said it is meant for systems that only support 1/4” jack, despite including adapter for 3.5mm.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The placement of the mic is crucial...
customer_reviews.text: The fact that a wireless mic at this price works is incredible. Pairing is reletivley easy. It's very light because its made out of plastic. The placement of the mic is crucial, I recorded an entire video, and because the capsule wasn't pointed directly at your mouth (i don't see how you will always have that option) It sounded awful. However if your were to hold the lav mic closely it sounds good. I will have to do more tests. Really wish it was an omni directional mic so you know you will have good audio 99% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nate's Film Tutorials

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a teacher when I'm sick and can't project my voice
customer_reviews.text: Could not connect with the receiver portion of this device so I ended up returning it. Update: the company sent me another model which is the most recent model and it works perfectly. I use it anytime I'm sick and can't really speak loudly.
customer_reviews.author: clamlamp

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Microphone
customer_reviews.text: This microphone is a very reliable microphone and enhances the sound quality of a video greatly! Coming in at only $35 it is very affordable and the ease of connecting it to my camera made it very worthwhile! Definitely recommend it! My only critique is the receiver doesn't have a place to stick to the camera body, so it is a bit awkward when walking around and using the mic as you have to hold it against the body of the camera. Loved how far you can get from the receiver and still pick up sound though!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Leong

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was having to give a presentation add a class that have the old RadioShack amplifiers and plugs. Works pretty well for the price. The distance isn't as good as advertised and the receiver goes through batteries very fast so be sure to have extra batteries handy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Still working flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I give this set a workout because I use it for personal video and professional video at work. The performance has always been great, the sound quality is top notch and it gives any video that professional edge as far as sound quality goes...plus they're inexpensive. I say buy them and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Just Love this Product... Great Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. We have been receiving FIFINE Merchandise for the past 3 years & they put our great products. Once again I am very please with the results of the Wireless Microphone System Headset & Lavalier Lapel (K037B) set up. Overall great sound quality & very well made. We look forward to more products from FIFINE. I highly recommend purchasing from FIFINE 100% great Customer Service. My review video is below...enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Good Mic for those on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: This mic was pretty easy to use. It has fairly good quality especially for its price. I like how the transmitter fits snug and doesn't feel like it's gonna fall even when i'm moving around. Sound quality is great even at a good distance, although it gets a little choppy the further you are. Connecting to IPhone is a little tricky since you'll need the camera app closed before plugging in the mic. Plugging it in while the app is open will lead to failure in recording good quality audio. Overall, it's perfect for those who are just starting out on Youtube and want a budget mic for their videos.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Wireless Microphone System
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, easy to use, lightweight, wireless microphone system with both a lavalier and a headset (you can only use one at a time). Setup is easy and intuitive. It transmits voice to the amplifier well with no noted distortion. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this thing. Has great range, great sound quality and picks up your voice very well especially with the little clip on microphone. I have an event in less than 30 days and it will be the first time talking with one of these things. I cannot give it a 5 star yet since I have not been able to see it perform in a live event.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: This wireless microphone system is easy to use and it outperformed our previous setup for recording sound on our videos. The voice quality is excellent and it has more than adequate bass tone, which keeps the voice sounding strong and rich rather than weak and light. The reception is very good in the distance range that we use the mic, which is about 30 - 35 feet away from the person speaking. I suspect that it would do as well pushing it out ten feet or more, but we haven't had the occasion to do so.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Great For Lav Mic The Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great lav for the price. The Mic comes with a transmitter and wireless receiver- with great range- a classic lav mic, and a headset. The connections feel very sturdy and well-built as well. The clip on the lavalier is sturdy, but it doesn’t swivel at all, which can make it a pain to attach to anything other than a shirt and tie.
customer_reviews.author: S. G. Willougby

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't really pleased when i got my unit because there was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this little unit based upon the review seen online. I wasn't really pleased when i got my unit because there was a problem with the battery compartment. I wrote to the company and they quickly sent a replacement. I must say they have an excellent customer service. The unit itself paired easily and the audio is quite acceptable for any professional setup. I took off one star because of the initial unit had a defect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Earle Patrick

customer_reviews.title: A great product... for 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I know this product has great reviews, So I can think that I have bad luck, why? I used it only 6 times. Suddenly and without notice some malfunction coming, The mic stoped working. The lights are on but no sound at all. I changed batteries, try different cameras, turn off and on over and over, and nothing...
customer_reviews.author: ulises alatriste

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 45 minutes and then never turned on again. Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microphone about a year ago but only just took it out of the box for its very first use today. It worked for about 45 minutes. And when I say "worked", I mean just barely. Even at only ten feet away, the mic had trouble staying connected to the receiver, so the sound was cutting in and out the entire time. After turning it off to take a lunch break, I went back to turn it on and it wouldn't power on at all. I changed the batteries three different times thinking it was the batteries. I even bought a whole new pack of batteries just in case....nothing. Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Krupinski

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid budget Mic Option!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Mic and wasn't really expecting much but it has worked out great. I'm able to record video with sound quality that is better than my cellphone mic. The materials are on the cheaper side but for this price your probably not going to fine higher end materials. I wish the mic came with it's own batteries to get started. I have only had it a couple weeks but so far I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: George DEFINED

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: I just got this but I popped some batteries in and plugged it into my Zoom H1 and bam it started working. The thing is great, it does capture a little more background noise than I would like but it's much better than a hand held (like the Zoom on its own). I will update the review if there is more info but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Henrickson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. My first one arrived used, my second doesn't work and can't be reset following their instructions. It says the volume can be changed but it can't. The mic worked for 10 seconds, clipping all the audio and then stopped working completely. A complete waste of my $40.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome product at an Awesome Price.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this wordless microphone setup. 1. Build quality is amazing, very sturdy, not flimsy. 2. A lot of accessories for the price. 3. Simple setup, easy to use. 4. Great Distance. 5. Great sound quality. I highly recommend this setup 100%. A great setup for a great price. Good job Fifine!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Dies after 30min
customer_reviews.text: I get maybe 30 min of talk time before the reciever just dies, so it's useless for an hour long class. I've tried all sorts of batteries with it, even investing in high quality rechargeable, and it doesnt make a bit of difference. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: addicted to amazon

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in my Music classroom. In the meantime, we have been using the lavalier for church services and it works well. It sounds good through either the bass amp or the the small regular amp. Battery life is good for the receiver and great for the transmitter. Pairing and use has been very easy. The headset works well, and we have been using it for singing. Both the lavalier and headset make it easier to be heard through masks during Covid-19 precautions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FIFINE Wireless Microphone System, Wireless Microphone set with Headset and Lavalier Lapel Mics, Beltpack Transmitter and Receiver,Ideal for Teaching, Preaching and Public Speaking Applications-K037B
feature_bullets: UHF Frequencies--The wireless lapel microphone system has 20 frequencies selection for seamless, interference-free operation.An easy-to-read LCD information display provides constant monitoring of system operation, Receiver battery condition indicators with low-battery warnings.

Convenient and easy to use-- No static,no drop out with use at a distance of 40-65 feet.With unique paired ID synchronization for each wireless transmitter and receiver make setup easy.Setting up a wireless mic is as simple as plugging in a wired microphone.

Wireless Headset & Lavalier--Headset microphone fits securely for active speakers and vocal performers.Lavalier microphone with included tie clip offers low visibility and hands-free use.optimized for Houses of Worship in a church preaching,YouTube videos,and classroom and presentation applications.

Versatile and Compatible Microphone-Work with mixers, pa speakers, electric guitar amplifiers and sound boards with 1/4'' interface to output the sound, ideal for teaching lectures,conference speech, visiting guide.With included 1/4" to 1/8" adapter-cable, suit for camera equipped 3.5mm mic jack recording.

What You Get--Wireless microphone set included headset microphone and Clip-on Lavalier Microphone Body pack Transmitter, Receiver with 1/4'' Plug,Solid metal collar clip and windscreen reduces plosives, wind, and breath sounds.Female 1/4" to 1/8" TRS adapter converter cord (for camera). 1/4" to 1/8" TRRS adapter cable (for smartphone).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,474 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
